title: 服务器启动器怎么打不开
author: e1027907617
txt_content:
如题  因为forge版本比较新只能用HMCL-2.3.3  然后打开就闪退   用bat打开就显示Error:Could not create the Java Virtual Machine Error:A fatal exception has occurred .Program will exit 
求解....

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 我一般出现这个问题重启电脑就可以了。。你试试

replies.author: TheFishing
replies.txt_content: 可能是java问题，检查一下版本

replies.author: 于乐
replies.txt_content: 应该是游戏内存设置过大

replies.author: 0天莫邪0
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出，改下内存就行了改成720

replies.author: 83989291c
replies.txt_content: 可能是客户端问题  重新下载看看
大概是JAVA的问题 你去下载个JAVA7试试
